entities.description: How the respondent feels about someone their age smoking one or more packs of cigarettes per day.
How the respondent feels about someone their age trying marijuana or any cannabis product once or twice.
How the respondent feels about someone their age using marijuana once a month or more.
How the respondent feels about someone their age having one or two drinks of an alcoholic beverage nearly every day.
The level of approval or disapproval, ranging from 'Neither approve nor disapprove' to 'Strongly disapprove'.
Frequency and percentage of respondents selecting each approval level.

relationships.description: Relates the approval level to the respondent's feelings about youth smoking.
Relates the approval level to the respondent's feelings about youth experimenting with marijuana.
Relates the approval level to the respondent's feelings about youth using marijuana monthly or more.
Relates the approval level to the respondent's feelings about youth consuming alcohol nearly every day.
Provides the frequency of responses for different levels of approval regarding youth smoking.
Provides the frequency of responses for different levels of approval regarding youth experimenting with marijuana.
Provides the frequency of responses for different levels of approval regarding youth using marijuana monthly or more.
Provides the frequency of responses for different levels of approval regarding youth alcohol usage.
